title: Calories for In-N-Out Hamburger
meta_description: Get calories for in n out classic hamburger (390 kcal), plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for menu variations.
assumptions: Standard single-patty hamburger with bun, beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and signature spread; no cheese or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, customizations, and allergens; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out hamburger provides 390 kcal with 16 g protein and 39 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories for in n out hamburger?
faqs.a: The standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out hamburger?
faqs.a: 16 g protein, 19 g fat, 39 g carbs per hamburger.

faqs.q: Calories for in n out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 480-500 kcal, depending on cheese type.
Protein-style (lettuce wrap) reduces carbs and calories by ~100-150 kcal vs. bun version.

faqs.q: How much sodium in In-N-Out hamburger?
